about_the_game:
LOCO music includes everything a beginner musician needs! In the process of using the application, you will learn how to read music sheets, get all the necessary basics on how to properly interact with a musical instrument and have access to a library of video lessons and a large amount of useful information.

You can explore whatever you want, and LOCO music will be a great tool in achieving your goals.

The music industry does not stand still, there will always be new hits and performers whose compositions you want to learn, and the skills that you acquire using our application will certainly help you and will be with you throughout your life.

Welcome to LOCO music, the complete solution for exploring the fascinating world of music.


LOCO music app includes 3 sections with 9 courses.
  • Each section refers to a specific type of musical instrument: keyboards, strings, and drums.
  • Each course includes video lessons and exercises to consolidate the acquired skills.
The curriculum is designed in such a way that any person can master the musical instrument of interest to him without any difficulties.
If you are already familiar with a tool or a specific topic, you can choose any particular lesson or topic that interests you, you, but also like any other students, you will have access to all courses regardless of your choice of interest.

It is absolutely not necessary to have a musical instrument to undergo training, but its presence will significantly improve the process of your learning, will help you to get practical skills from the first day.

You can connect instruments that have MIDI support as a controller:
  • Keyboards
  • Electronic drums
  • Electronic percussion
* At the moment, active development is underway on the full functionality of the application and shooting of video lessons.
detailed_description:
Early Beta Access


About the Software


LOCO music includes everything a beginner musician needs! In the process of using the application, you will learn how to read music sheets, get all the necessary basics on how to properly interact with a musical instrument and have access to a library of video lessons and a large amount of useful information.

You can explore whatever you want, and LOCO music will be a great tool in achieving your goals.

The music industry does not stand still, there will always be new hits and performers whose compositions you want to learn, and the skills that you acquire using our application will certainly help you and will be with you throughout your life.

Welcome to LOCO music, the complete solution for exploring the fascinating world of music.


LOCO music app includes 3 sections with 9 courses.
  • Each section refers to a specific type of musical instrument: keyboards, strings, and drums.
  • Each course includes video lessons and exercises to consolidate the acquired skills.
The curriculum is designed in such a way that any person can master the musical instrument of interest to him without any difficulties.
If you are already familiar with a tool or a specific topic, you can choose any particular lesson or topic that interests you, you, but also like any other students, you will have access to all courses regardless of your choice of interest.

It is absolutely not necessary to have a musical instrument to undergo training, but its presence will significantly improve the process of your learning, will help you to get practical skills from the first day.

You can connect instruments that have MIDI support as a controller:
  • Keyboards
  • Electronic drums
  • Electronic percussion
* At the moment, active development is underway on the full functionality of the application and shooting of video lessons.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Linux.
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatibility (everything since about 2010)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 Mavericks or newer. 64-bit.
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatibility (everything since about 2010).
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: LOCO music

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatibility (everything since about 2010)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Meet the unique simulator that allows you to learn the basics of music! With LOCO music you can learn how to play keyboards, strings and even drums!
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain
